com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.util

Class Util

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.util.Util

  • public final class Util
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains general util methods that dont fit in UtilGraphics, UtilXML or UtilMath.
    Author:
    Maxstupo
